title: Cant log into main account
body:
hey, my main account is called tazzalenko.

I havent played the game in ages and for some reason im not able to log in. 

I can change the password and it doesnt look like anything has been changed. 

Can someone let me know what the issue is ? I can sign into this account with no issues.

The error message i get is that the user name and password dont match, however ive been able to change the password and confirm the username and still cant sign in =( 
 
thanks
